类 RecipeCreateView

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
view.RecipeCreateView
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class RecipeCreateView extends javafx.stage.Stage
This view is used to create or edit a recipe.
作者:
Yan Yi
